AD.name: Use GML Encoding
AD.description: When outputting atom records check to use GeoRSS GML encoding. Unchecked will use GeoRSS simple encoding

AD.name: Feed Security Format
AD.description: Name of configuration format that should be used for security markings in the atom feed.

AD.name: Configuration Format
AD.description: Name of the configuration format. This name is used in the CDR Atom Transformer Settings to specify which security settings to use.

AD.name: Atom Feed Security Namespace
AD.description: The XML namespace for the security attributes that are populated in the fields below. This will be placed in the Atom feed element. This will also be placed in atom entry elements where security markings in the metadata could not be found

AD.name: Atom Feed Security Attributes
AD.description: Name/Value pairs for the security attributes that should appear in the atom feed to denote the security markings of the Results. These will also be placed in the atom entry elements where security markings in the metadata could not be found
